contract_description: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Product X06, Product Y06, Product Z06.
objective: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Product X06, Product Y06, Product Z06.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product X06: $15 per unit, Product Y06:$25 per unit, Product Z06: $35 per unit. Payment Terms: The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 45 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payment Method: Payments shall be made via PayPal, as agreed upon by both parties.
termination_clause: Termination for Convenience: Either party may terminate this Contract with 60 days written notice to the other party. Termination for Cause: Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
